greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Even numbers interleaved with repeated odd numbers.
comment: Row sum of superimposed binary filled triangle. - _Craig Knecht_, Aug 07 2015
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Craig Knecht, Row sums of superimposed binary triangles.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,1,0,1,0,-1).
formula: a(n) = n if n is even, else 2*floor(n/4)+1.
a(n) = n-(1-(-1)^n)*(n+i^(n(n+1)))/4, where i=sqrt(-1). - _Bruno Berselli_, Feb 23 2011
a(n) = a(n-2)+a(n-4)-a(n-6) for n>5. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Aug 07 2015
mathematica: n = 88; Riffle[Range[0, n, 2], Flatten@ Transpose[{Range[1, n, 2], Range[1, n, 2]}]] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jul 14 2015 *)
program: interleave (x:xs) ys = x : interleave ys xs
(MAGMA) [IsEven(n) select n else 2*Floor(n/4)+1: n in [0..100]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 13 2015
xref: Cf. A186422 (first differences), A186423 (partial sums), A240828 (row sum of superimposed binary triangle).
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 21 2011
